com.isti.util.gui
Class IstiMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JList
                  com.isti.util.gui.IstiMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class IstiMenu
extends javax.swing.JList
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener

A Menu-looking widget that is happier than a JMenu to sit on a panel. [HS] 6-23-2003 - Initial version [ET] 6-25-2003 - Made 'optionNameToOptionInfo' declaration include "final". [HS] 7-01-2003 - Added removeMenuItem() [HS] 7-02-2003 - Made non-rollover (and mostly non selectable) items out of the items that have no ActionListeners [HS] 7-02-2003 - Added support for a default list of ActionListeners [KF] 2-06-2004 - Added 'getNumMenuItems' method.

See Also:
Serialized Form

addDefaultActionListener

public void addDefaultActionListener(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
Add a new ActionListener to the default list. These listeners are alerted when a menu item without any other ActionListeners is selected.

Parameters:
listener - a new default ActionListener
